title: Vector V.S. Bitmaps
message:
BM:
- no limit to how complicated 
- low quality when zoomed in
- made of pixels
- drawn by a culmination of pixels
- good for animation and games
- pixels can be any color, makes gradients possible
- when downscaled, the resolution becomes really bad

Vector: 
- can be zoomed in forever
- drawn using math and angles
- can be downscaled and not lose resolution
- on screen refresh, graphics are redrawn
